mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, product_id, orders_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{ordersDate})
mapper.select: SELECT o.orders_id, o.user_id, o.product_id, o.orders_date, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_description AS productDescription, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
